content: DX 9-ENP Powder-actuated decking tool Digitally enabled, fully automatic, high-productivity, stand-up powder-actuated nailer for fastening metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Revolutionary design – upright working position for high speed of use and long-term user comfort Ergonomically designed handle to enhance user comfort Adjustable power regulator – precise control for more reliable fastenings Easy to clean and maintain on jobsites Use-on-demand service tailored to meet your project needs Applications Fastening metal roof decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) with X-ENP metal sheet nails for roofing Fastening metal floor decks to steel structures with a minimum thickness of 6 mm (1/4) with X-ENP metal sheet nails for flooring ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 39.3 x 12.6 x 6.9 in Weight: 26.5 lb. Fastener Intake: Collated Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 39.3 x 12.6 x 6.9 in | Weight | 26.5 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.75 - 0.98 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber long, 6.8/18 M40 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | Yes | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 564 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-9-ENP ### ITEMS- 3577823 -
